SELECT F.LESSON_PRICE AS PAYMENT_PRICE, C.DUE AS PAYMENT_DUEDATE, D.STUDENT_NAME, G.SCODE_VALUE||D.STUDENT_GRADE as STUDENT_GRADE, I.CLASS_NAME, J.PARENT_NAME, J.PARENT_HP, D.STUDENT_ID FROM (SELECT A.STUDENT_ID AS SID, NVL(B.PAYMENT_DUEDATE,A.TA_APLLYDATE) AS DUE, A.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID AS LID FROM TAKE_LESSON A LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYMENT B ON (A.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID = B.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID AND A.STUDENT_ID = B.STUDENT_ID) )C, STUDENT D, LESSONASSIGNMENT E, LESSON F, (SELECT * FROM STANDARDCODE WHERE SCODE_CATEGORY = 'STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE')G, BELONG H, CLASS I, PARENT J WHERE C.SID = D.STUDENT_ID AND C.LID = E.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID AND E.LESSON_ID = F.LESSON_ID AND D.STUDENT_GRADE_CATEGORY_CODE = G.SCODE_KEY AND C.SID = H.STUDENT_ID AND H.CLASS_ID = I.CLASS_ID AND D.PARENT_ID = J.PARENT_ID
AND ( D.STUDENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{studentName}||'%' OR G.SCODE_VALUE LIKE '%'||#{studentName}||'%' OR J.PARENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{studentName}||'%' OR J.PARENT_HP LIKE '%'||#{studentName}||'%' OR I.CLASS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{studentName}||'%' )
AND SYSDATE
-#{paymentDuedate}
> TO_DATE(C.DUE, 'YYYYMMDD')
